name: NIKE
description: Nike is a globally recognized sportswear and lifestyle brand known for its innovative athletic footwear, apparel, and accessories. Founded in 1964, the company has become a symbol of performance, motivation, and style. Nike operates by designing and marketing high-quality products for a wide range of sports and everyday use, often collaborating with top athletes and influencers. Its iconic Swoosh logo and Just Do It slogan have become part of popular culture. Through a mix of cutting-edge technology, strategic marketing, and global distribution, Nike continues to lead the industry and inspire millions around the world.

name: ADIDAS
description: Adidas is a global sportswear brand headquartered in Germany, recognized for its performance-driven shoes, clothing, and accessories. The brand combines athletic function with streetwear style and is famous for its three-stripe logo. Adidas frequently partners with athletes, designers, and celebrities to create impactful collaborations.

name: MICROSOFT
description: Microsoft is a multinational technology company known for its Windows operating system, Microsoft Office, and cloud platform Azure. It is a major player in both consumer and enterprise software. Microsoft also owns LinkedIn, GitHub, and Xbox, contributing to its influence in professional networking, development tools, and gaming.

name: SAMSUNG
description: Samsung is a South Korean multinational corporation known for its cutting-edge consumer electronics, including smartphones, televisions, and home appliances. It is a global leader in technology, with its Galaxy product line standing out in the mobile market. Samsung emphasizes innovation, quality, and sleek design across all its products.
